General.Name: Dogusan Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Dogusan Boru Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells materials related to tiles, and floor and wall coverings in Turkey. The company is based in Erzincan, Turkey.
General.Address: Erzincan - Sivas Karayolu, 14. Km., Erzincan, Turkey
